messages.message:
When checked, this peak will be constrained to the FWHM functional form gamma and x-ray peaks are normally constrained to.
When un-checked, the FWHM for this peak will be fit from the data, independent of all other peak widths.
Un-checking this option is useful for annihilation and reaction photopeaks.

Check this option if the peak is for a gamma of known energy.
Un-check this option if this peak is an observed peak in the spectrum with unknown true energy.
